channel.title: Null out printing!
channel.description:
Hello. I have a big error in my Demise Pk 5 Sourch! Sometimes the run.bat prints out Null Null Null Etc. Then i have to restart it.. I use a auto restarted for every 3 hours. But i just want it awy the Null print out. I remember i saw a tut for it a long time ago and i didnt needed it cuz i had a other server!
Hope someone can help me with this! Thank you.

item.title: Null out printing!
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

You’re printing an unassigned object to the console. You need to do some debugging yourself to see what that object is? Maybe you need to be protecting yourself by using:

if (object != null) {
    // Execute desired action.
}

Where an object can be a player, npc, item or object. Any constructed instance entity really.

What kind of things does your server usually print to the console? After the null is showing, what is not being written to the console? Use that kind of method to determine where your problem lies.

Read full topic

item.title: Null out printing!
item.dc:creator: @edge4pker edge4pker
item.description:
@edge4pker wrote:

SGTCannon:

Your run.bat seems to be fine, can you paste in your code for the autorestarter? It’d seem that that would be where the problem lies.

uhm. It cant be the autorestarter. Cuz i normaly dont use a autorestarter but i had to do it cuz i had that null glitch

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon

@SGTCannon wrote:

Your run.bat seems to be fine, can you paste in your code for the autorestarter? It’d seem that that would be where the problem lies.

item.title: Null out printing!
item.dc:creator: @edge4pker edge4pker
item.description:
@edge4pker wrote:

[quote=“SGTCannon, post:2, topic:384519”]So you’re saying when the autorestarer is supposed to kick in, it doesn’t? Or does the server crash? Or what?

Does it print the nulls when you originally run the run.bat, or after a certain amount of time?

What base is this? Delta? Pi? Other?

Also, can you paste the code on you run.bat (Right click -> Edit) in using [Code] [/ Code], and your autorestarter’s code as well? Would help to see if something in those was incorrectly coded.[/quote]

Sorry. xD
I am using Delta.
This is what happen.
I open the run.bat and my Autorestarter. It restarts the server every 3 hours. No problem with that
After a while (half/Hole day or sometimes few hours) i get printed out Null.
It also Nulls the server witch make you can only login and do nothing.

Nothing wrong with the run.bat i gues…

@echo off title Edge4Pk java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit

(maby mysql? But im not sure…)

Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Null out printing!
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

So you’re saying when the autorestarer is supposed to kick in, it doesn’t? Or does the server crash? Or what?

Does it print the nulls when you originally run the run.bat, or after a certain amount of time?

What base is this? Delta? Pi? Other?

Also, can you paste the code on you run.bat (Right click -> Edit) in using [Code] [/ Code], and your autorestarter’s code as well? Would help to see if something in those was incorrectly coded.

Read full topic
